ul.class: csw cs-icon-group cs-icon-lg cs-icon-center cs-icon-default cs-icon-bg-default cs-icon-text-default

h2.a: Click here to read Spectrum's informational E-book!

div.p: The 6th grade building provides a single-grade, comfortable setting where students grow into the role of middle school student. Teachers utilize a team approach, collaborating with parents to provide students with the support they need to take on the additional rigor at the middle school level.

The 7/8 program at Spectrum Middle School provides a unique setting where students in two grade levels build positive relationships, develop the social and emotional growth unique to middle school students, and solidify their knowledge and skills to be successful when they enter high school and beyond. Classes integrate technology through our one-to-one Chromebook program and students develop character through participation in our service learning program. Spectrum Middle School students also have the opportunity to try out and participate in high school competitive athletic and performing arts opportunities.

Spectrum High School is a welcoming college preparatory program where students have access to college courses through our College @ Spectrum High School (C@SH) program - allowing them to earn (up to) their AA degree while remaining on the high school campus. Courses integrate technology through our one-to-one Chromebook program and students develop character through participation in our service learning program. Spectrum High School is a member of the Minnesota State High School League and offers an abundance of competitive athletic and performing arts opportunities. Our students are able to fully enjoy their high school experience while earning college credits!

h3.a: Spectrum’s Annual Board of Directors Election – Monday, April 20, 2020

div.p: The Vision of Spectrum High School and Spectrum Middle School is to be a leader in fostering academic and personal excellence through programs emphasizing high academic standards in a small-school setting.
